hero.title: About OROGUD
hero.subtitle: Rooted in tradition, crafted for modern living
hero.description: We curate authentic, organic products that bring the wisdom of Ayurveda and traditional Indian practices into your daily life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At OROGUD, we believe in the power of natural, time-tested ingredients. Our mission is to make authentic Ayurvedic and organic products accessible to everyone, while maintaining the highest standards of purity and quality. We work directly with small-scale farmers and traditional artisans to bring you products that are not just good for you, but good for the planet too.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: Every product is sourced from trusted suppliers who follow traditional methods and organic practices.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We test and verify every batch to ensure purity, potency, and safety. No compromises, ever.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We're committed to eco-friendly packaging, ethical sourcing, and supporting local communities.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear labeling, honest sourcing information, and open communication about our products and practices.

sections.heading: The Beginning
sections.content: OROGUD was born from a simple realization: the products our grandparents used daily—pure ghee, organic jaggery, traditional herbs—were becoming harder to find in their authentic form. What started as a personal quest to source quality products for our families grew into a mission to share these treasures with others.

sections.heading: What We Do
sections.content: We travel across India, visiting farms, meeting artisans, and building relationships with suppliers who share our values. Every product in our collection is handpicked, tested, and verified. We don't just sell products—we curate experiences that connect you to centuries of traditional wisdom.

sections.heading: Looking Forward
sections.content: As we grow, our commitment remains the same: to bring you the purest, most authentic products while supporting the communities and traditions that make them possible. We're building a bridge between ancient wisdom and modern wellness.
